channel.title: Auto-Tutorial Island! Not a l33cher this time!
channel.description: Hi guys. I am thinking about working on an Auto-Tutorial Island. Of coruse, i would need some help with it, since i cant really do it all by myself. If anyone wants to help, reply. Or if there is already a full-functioning one, please let me know! THanks in advanced

item.title: Auto-Tutorial Island! Not a l33cher this time!
item.dc:creator: @martijntjuh martijntjuh
item.description:
@martijntjuh wrote:

eey people i made 1 but it doesnt work with talking…and the procedure that it creates people doesnt work i send it in a second…

EDIT:if some 1 could help me with fixing it?

second edit!:

here it is!pelase help me i made it pretty good i think…but it doesnt talk and cant create player…

[code]//this is a tut runner!!//
//my second script!//
//this will do the tutorial for ya!//
//made by…///
//MARTIJNTJUH//

program martijntjuhstutorialrunner;
{.include srl\srl.scar}

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers :=4;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer:=0;
Players[0].Name :=’’
Players[0].Pass :=’’;
Players[0].Nick :=’’;
Players[0].Active:=True;

Players[1].Name :=’’;
Players[1].Pass :=’’;
Players[1].Nick :=’’;
Players[1].Active:=true;

Players[2].Name :=’’;
Players[2].Pass :=’’;
Players[2].Nick :=’’;
Players[2].Active:=true;

Players[3].Name :=’’;
Players[3].Pass :=’’;
Players[3].Nick :=’’;
Players[3].Active:=true;

end;

procedure Createplayer;
begin
if FindObj(X,y,‘Accept’,49152,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
end;

procedure speaktotalk;
begin
Face(‘E’);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,5264527,10)then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
end;

procedure opendoor;
begin
if FindObj(X,y,‘Open’,875386,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
end;

procedure tosurviver;
begin
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,15886346,566,20,752,166))Then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
end;

procedure SpeakToSurviver;
begin
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,5264527,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
end;

procedure OpenBag;
begin
OpenBag;
end;

procedure CutTree;
begin
if FindObj(X,y,‘Chop down’,2633768,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(7000);
ClickToContinue;
end;

procedure makefire;
begin
ClickItemColor(606304, True);
ClickItemColor(4156040, True);
end;

procedure openandtalk;
begin
mouse(585,189,1,2,true)
OpenBag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,5264527,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
end;

procedure fish;
begin
if FindObj(X,y,‘Net’,15515792,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(5000)
begin
if FindObj(X,y,‘Net’,15515792,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(5000)
end;
end;

procedure cookfish;
begin
ClickItemColor(5533079, True);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Use’,4049139,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(1500)
ClickItemColor(5533079, True);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Use’,4049139,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(1500)
end;

procedure togate;
begin
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,239,566,20,752,166))Then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
Flag;
end;

procedure opengate;
begin
if FindObj(X,y,‘Open’,875655,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
end;

procedure ChefCook;
begin
Mouse(677,122,2,1,true)
Flag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Open’,1659242,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,5193278,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
Mouse(624,269,2,1,true)
wait(500)
Mouse(667,266,2,1,true)
wait(500)
Mouse(709,263,2,1,true)
wait(500)
if FindObj(X,y,‘Use’,1847015,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
Mouse(738,485,2,1,true)
wait(500)
OpenBag;
Mouse(615,89,2,1,true)
Flag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Open’,1659242,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
SetRun(true);
end;

procedure Questguide;
begin
Mouse(578,87,2,1,true)
Flag;
Mouse(585,49,2,1,true)
Flag;
Mouse(646,47,2,1,true)
Face(‘S’);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Open’,2519700,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,4287784,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
Mouse(615,189,2,1,true)
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,4287784,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
OpenBag;
Face(‘S’);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Climb’,2312290,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
end;

procedure Mining;
begin
Mouse(684,21,2,1,true);
Flag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,8221012,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Mine’,6710894,10) then
Mouse(x,y,1,1,false)
ChooseOption(x, y, ‘Prospect’);
wait(3000)
Mouse(625,74,2,1,true);
Flag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Mine’,3755107,10) then
Mouse(x,y,1,1,false)
ChooseOption(x, y, ‘Prospect’);
wait(3000)
Mouse(668,90,2,1,true);
Flag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,8221012,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Mine’,6710894,10) then
Mouse(x,y,1,1,true)
wait(5000)
Mouse(625,74,2,1,true);
Flag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Mine’,3755107,10) then
Mouse(x,y,1,1,true)
wait(5000)
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,2128895,566,20,752,166))Then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
Mouse(628,301,2,1,true);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Use’,2242989,10) then
Mouse(x,y,1,1,true)
wait(3000)
Mouse(646,110,2,1,true);
Flag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,8221012,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,4148543,566,20,752,166))Then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
Mouse(628,300,2,1,true);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Use Bronze bar ->Anvil’,8221012,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(300)
Mouse(35,64,2,1,true);
wait(500)
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,4148543,566,20,752,166))Then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
Face(‘E’)
if FindObj(X,y,‘Open’,1850957,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
end;

procedure fight;
Begin
Mouse(624,20,2,1,true);
Flag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,594520,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
Mouse(684,186,2,1,true);
OpenBag;
Mouse(629,297,2,1,true);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,594520,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
OpenBag;
Mouse(628,298,2,1,true);
wait(200)
Mouse(713,301,2,1,true);
wait(200)
Mouse(560,189,2,1,true);
wait(200)
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,11730430,566,20,752,166))Then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
Face(‘W’);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Open’,1850957,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(300)
OpenBag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Attack’,7688015,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(30000)
Face(‘E’)
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,11730430,566,20,752,166))Then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
Flag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Open’,6974067,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(300)
Mouse(680,93,2,1,true);
Flag;
Face(‘S’)
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,594520,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
Mouse(711,299,2,1,true);
wait(100)
Mouse(584,336,2,1,true);
wait(100)
Face(‘N’);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Attack’,8410966,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(25000)
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,6218,566,20,752,166))Then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Climb’,12360,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(500)
end;

procedure bank;
begin
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,4309211,566,20,752,166))Then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Use’,6981526,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
Mouse(258,398,2,1,true);
wait(1000)
CloseBank;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Open’,2291706,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(1000)
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,1118484,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Open’,2291706,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(1000)
Face(‘E’)
Mouse(716,93,2,1,true);
Flag;
Mouse(651,110,2,1,true);
Flag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,1751251,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
Mouse(712,186,2,1,true);
wait(1000)
OpenBag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,1751251,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
Mouse(584,486,2,1,true);
wait(1000)
Mouse(613,484,2,1,true);
wait(1000)
OpenBag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,1751251,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Open’,2291706,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(1000)
end;

procedure magic;
begin
Mouse(706,38,2,1,true);
Flag;
Mouse(654,53,2,1,true);
Flag;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,9264401,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
Mouse(739,185,2,1,true);
wait(2000)
ClickToContinue;
Mouse(567,227,2,1,true);
if FindObj(X,y,‘Cast Wind Strike ->Chicken’,595048,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(2000)
if FindObj(X,y,‘Cast Wind Strike ->Chicken’,595048,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(2000)
if FindObj(X,y,‘Cast Wind Strike ->Chicken’,595048,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
wait(2000)
if FindObj(X,y,‘Talk’,9264401,10) then
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
ClickToContinue;
Mouse(257,398,2,1,true);
wait(1000)
ClickToContinue;
OpenBag;
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
DeclarePlayers;
Repeat
Createplayer
speaktotalk;
opendoor;
tosurviver;
SpeakToSurviver;
OpenBag;
CutTree;
makefire;
openandtalk;
fish;
cookfish;
togate;
opengate;
ChefCook;
Questguide;
Mining;
fight;
bank;
magic;
NextPlayer(true)
until(false)
end.[/code]
